mapper.sql: ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION, COMPONENT, ICON, IS_FRAME, MENU_NAME, MENU_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, PARENT_ID, PATH, PERMS, REMARK, VISIBLE
select id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, is_frame, menu_type, visible, perms, icon, create_time from t_sod_menu
mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from t_sod_menu m left join t_sod_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join t_sod_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.perms as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from t_sod_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible ='0' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.perms as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from t_sod_menu m left join t_sod_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join t_sod_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join t_sod_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.id left join t_sod_user u on ur.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible ='0' AND ro.status ='0' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.id, m.parent_id from t_sod_menu m left join t_sod_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.id not in (select m.parent_id from t_sod_menu m inner join t_sod_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id and rm.role_id = #{roleId}) order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

MENU_NAME = #{menuName},
